description:
Kite must learn to work with Yuma if he wants to take down Trey and Quattro and rescue Hart!  Can Kite put his pride to the side and accept Yuma’s help, or will Kite’s ego end up sacrificing Hart’s safety?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiseki no Overlay! Neo Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon
The Miraculous Overlay! Neo Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon
奇跡のオーバーレイ! 超銀河眼の光子龍(ネオ・ギャラクシーアイズ・フォトン・ドラゴン)
